# Nelexa\GPlay\Model\AppInfo::getFullUrl
`Nelexa\GPlay\Model\AppInfo::getFullUrl` â€” Returns the full URL of the app's page on Google Play, specifying the locale and country of the request.

## Description
```php
Nelexa\GPlay\Model\AppInfo::getFullUrl ( void ) : string
```

## Parameters
This function has no parameters.

## Return Values
URL of the app's page on Google Play, specifying the
locale and country of the request
